channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When brands play hard to get: why you’re drawn to products that neg you
item.description: We call this “dissuasive framing.” Instead of saying a product is perfect for everyone, a company is up front about who it might not be for.
